title: Zohran Mamdani Plans to End NYC Sweeps of Homeless Encampments
description:
New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani is not planning to continue clearing out homeless encampments in his city when he takes office.
The post Zohran Mamdani Plans to End NYC Sweeps of Homeless Encampments appeared first on Breitbart.
content:
New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani is not planning to continue clearing out homeless encampments in his city when he takes office.
